name: JPEG 2000 NDNP Profile
extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="disclosure">Is open format.</field><field name="filenameExtension"></field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
description: Implementation of JPEG 2000 Core Coding (Part 1) that constrains the use of variables in the specification and has been designed to support the National Digital Newspaper Program (NDNP).
